General.Name: Taiwan Printed Circuit Board Techvest Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Printed Circuit Board Techvest Co.,Ltd., a professional manufacturing service company, manufactures and sells electronic components and printed circuit boards (PCBs). The company offers PCBs for notebooks, servers, memory modules, etc., as well as LCD products. It also engages in the general investment activities. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 12 Industry Road 2nd, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
